title: Riot please help me and take away the punishment.
body: Once again i got a penalty from your game that keeps crashing and it keeps on happening to many people so now i have to wait 30 minutes to play another game like why in the hell are you punishing people when you know that it is completely your fault, i have been dealing with this problem because i love to play league but now im just tired of this bullcrap can you atleast take away the punishments that arent even my fault this game is so broken its not even fun anymore this is the 9th time the client has crashed in champe select please riot fix this and take away my punishment because it is  just completely unfair.

replies.body:
Disconnections from a match have an adverse affect on everyone in the match, regardless of the reason for the disconnection. This is a key reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified. 

Crashes that happen during champ select are often caused by the client experiencing a drop in connection to the server due to an unstable connection. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions for an unstable connection and is a great starting point in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you continue to have this issue after working through those steps.

its not a connection problem its is your broken game. i was fine before 6.14 played lots of games and it never happened once but after the recent updates im getting punished for your borken game and im mad there is no  reason why i am trying to play your game , i get disconnected because your game is broken and i get ni truble what type of company does this, you guys are a joke.

and its not me laving a game i cm in champ select and your client stops working how does that affect everyone? they go back to searching for a game and i get punished? yea affecting "everyone" i just want this crap to stop i have been scared to play ranked because i might get another loss from your game crashing and lose lp when it is not my fault, and I know its not only me as i have seen in the forums that LO"TS of people are having the same problem why cant you guys do something about it

Freezing or crashing in champ select then returning the home page is usually a result of a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers. Champ Select in all modes requires a more steady connection than the home page as picks (and bans for Draft) are processed in real-time. This is why it's more vulnerable to disconnect there. 

It's not a widespread issue as only a few Summoners are experiencing this issue. 

I highly recommend you follow the steps in the guide Targons Blade linked you so we can put your disconnections to rest, prevent future punishments and level up your pre-gameplay experience. :)

inccorect. i have friends that i play with and we talk on curse and they all experience it, tons of people have it happen to them when im in a lobby, people even responded to my posts saying that it has happened to them aswell, and i am pissed because i dont lose internet connection as i am still talking to friends as my client crashes.

While your network may not be at fault here, your connection with the LoL servers definitely is. It's very possible to have connection issues only with LoL. 

I recommend that you link your friends to the guide Targons Blade posted.

As for anyone else experiencing similar issues, they're free to contact us and we'll be happy to assist.
